reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At first we were quite disappointed when we saw the decor in our room as it was quite outdated which you can see from most of the pictures already on this site but once you get past that you will have a better stay at this hotel than many others in Morocco.
reviews.title: Customer service second to none! Excellent choice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Its worth mentioning that this hotel doesn't have air conditioning and being from chilly Scotland we were worried that this would be a huge problem in the 40 degree+ heat! When we went to the desk to ask if there were any rooms with air con the lovely man on reception could not be more accommodating. He showed us around a few other rooms that might be a bit cooler and gave us a huge fan to keep throughout our stay which was more than adequate. If you think air con is going to be a problem then I am sure if you request it in your booking they'd keep you one aside.
reviews.title: Excellent place will return again soon hisham!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The rooms were very clean - not a spot of dirt in sight and again the housekeeping man was so very polite, a joy to talk to in the morning!
reviews.title: Clean, friendly and really well situated in Agadir

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool is probably the cleanest I have ever been in and I have never known anyone to take such pride in their job than this hotel's pool man, he is there are the crack of dawn every morning cleaning the pool and is the last to leave in the evening! The sun beds and cushions are wiped down before you sit down every morning and the lovely relaxing pool area is spotless.
reviews.title: Clean and very friendly hotel- would recommend!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Location is perfect only 10 mins walk to the beach where there are plenty places to eat / drink, we made the trip several times late at night and didn't get any hassle. Should only be 20Dh in a taxi from the Supratours bus station.
reviews.title: Fab value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel Kamal from February 26th until March 2nd and I couldn't say that we wished to stay at a better place. Hotel Kamal is a very nice place to stay, and offers great quality for its price.
reviews.title: Great choice, excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everyone at the hotel is very friendly, from the receptionist, people at breakfast, and at the pool. They are hardworking and neat, doing their best to make you feel comfortable. The room (and the rest of the hotel also) was extreme clean and being cleaned troughout the day. The pool was very nice, clear and clean water, large enough to make your laps whenever you want.
reviews.title: Needs remodeling

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is situated at the Hassan II Boulevard, and you can find everything you need in the surroundings of the hotel. Beach is a 5 minutes walk from the hotel, but when having a room with poolview, you will also have a room with seeview!
reviews.title: Great value, friendly, clean, chilled and a pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: I really cannot understand how this is rated as #4 hotel iin Agadir. I was disappointed by the condition of the bathroom, moldy tiles and in old/poor condition. The staff is friendly and the pool area is much nicer than the rooms. I suppose if you are on a budget this place is acceptable, but I really could not give it a good rating based on the state of the bathroom. The hotel has a lot of potential but the rooms/bathrooms need a major overhaul.
reviews.title: 2nd time and still great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't be put off by the unattractive exterior, inside a cool lobby and lovely pool setting awaits.
reviews.title: Good and CLEAN hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Double bed room with breakfast for 325 dirhams. Central loction - easy to find, reach. Clean! ( very important in Marocco :-)) Very good services - helpful receptionist etc. Basic breakfast - croissant, fresh juice, butter, jam, bread and tee/coffee. I really recommend this hotel for the price and cleanless. Nearest restaurant ( "Scampi" ) is very good but expensive ( 160 per meal ). And what about Agadir? Dirty beach full of rabbish. This town is just for sunbathing. Cheap restaurant close to mosque - SESAME. Taxi - 10 dirhams - nice price :-)
reviews.title: worth for budget price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For a sunny get away this was pefect.
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were fanastic, hotel kept very clean.
reviews.title: Brilliant Spotlessly Clean Friendly Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Just a shame Agadir was rubbish!
reviews.title: love the place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Just back from staying at the Hotel Kamal. This hotel is very moderately priced and so very clean. The staff are so polite, helpful and friendly. They have a wonderful pool, which is also spotlessly clean,. Our room and bathroom, while basic, was so very clean, clean sheets almost daily. We had a small TV in the room with 2 English stations showing world news. We had a pool facing room which was very quiet.
reviews.title: Good to be back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very clean, friendly and helpful staff and an excellent location - convenient for the cheap but good local restaurants in the Tarborjt area and only a ten minute walk to the beach via the (now free) 'Valley of the birds' which is a sort of corridor park containing a menagerie. Lovely pool area with a small snack bar. OK the rooms are a little in need of refurb but for the price we were very happy. Oh not to mention there is an off license (Uniprix) conveniently on the opposite corner
reviews.title: This hotel lived up to the reviews we had read, not posh but really nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: If you want all inclusive, to be surrounded by loads of other tourists or party party party then the hotel Kamal is not for you.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: However if you want perfect and personal service a pleasant uncrowded ambiance, immaculate clean rooms, then you will really enjoy your stay.
reviews.title: this is an excellent clean friendly hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We were so impressed we will be returning within six weeks.
reviews.title: Nice for a short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: there is no poolside loud music, no drunks, no yobs, just quiet and peaceful, with good rooms,both poolside and terrace restaurants providing excellent meals, the only thing lacking is information, neither restaurants are advertised in the hotel itself, nor are the facilities which the reception provides brought to the notice of visitors, might I suggest a small brochure in the rooms with information therein such as one finds in other hotels. This hotels greatest assett is its staff.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!
